attributes.action: STOP the War in Sri Lanka and bring about a just and dignfied resolution to the Tamil issue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned call upon to British Government to:
1. STOP the war in Sri Lanka which has resulted in more than 500 Tamil civilians killed by Sri Lankan armed forces, hundreds injured and without medical assistance. over 400,000 are internally displaced by the Sri Lankan armed forces and have no shelter. sanitation, clean drinking water, food or medicines.
2. Immediately allow International NGO's, the UN organisations to give humanitarian assistance to the 400,000 internally displaced and injured
3. Bring about a negotiated just and dignified resolution to the conflict between the Tamil people their representatives in the Tamil National Alliance and the LTTE and the Sri Lankan government

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
